issue.message: To get local formatting use `getDateInstance()`, `getDateTimeInstance()`, or `getTimeInstance()`, or use `new SimpleDateFormat(String template, Locale locale)` with for example `Locale.US` for ASCII dates.
issue.errorLine1: SimpleDateFormat("EEE, d MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss Z").parse(lastModifiedHeader)!!.time

issue.message: org.jetbrains.uast.kotlin.internal.CliKotlinUastResolveProviderService is UAST implementation. Consider using one of its corresponding UAST interfaces: `KotlinUastResolveProviderService`, `BaseKotlinUastResolveProviderService`
